title: The loyal brother, or, The Persian prince a tragedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by Their Majesties servants / by Thomas Southern.
author: Southerne, Thomas, 1660-1746.
notes: Prologue and epilogue by John Dryden.
Based on a novel called "Tachinas, prince of Persia", translated from the French by P. Porter.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
